item.title: Basic Terms of Security - Cloud Comp
item.description: Information Security Confidentiality - only accessible to authorized parties restricting access (both transit and storage) Integrity - makes sure data isn’t altered or manipulated how data is stored, processed, and retrieved

item.title: Cloud Comp Questions
item.description: Unit 1 2 Marks Define Cloud Computing 5 Marks Differentiate parallel and distributed computing What are the technologies applied in distributed computing?

item.title: Cloud Computing Intro
item.description: Types of Cloud Computing Public Private Hybrid How to build cloud computing environment Manager Orchestrater (diagram) rea

item.title: Cloud Delivery Models
item.description: Cloud delivery = IaaS - Infrastructure as a service Resources, self-contained IT environment hardware, network, connectivity, (check?) cloud service provider provides everything

item.title: Cloud Deployment Models
item.description: Cloud Deployment Models represents a specific type of cloud environment distinguished by ownership, size, and access Four main - Public Cloud available to anyone usually at a cost or commercizalized by other avenues (advertisement) cloud provider = responsible for creating a cloud and maintaining it

item.title: Components of IAM
item.description: What is IAM? Identity Access Management to control access of individual and group access a combination of policies identifying people and allocating resources

item.title: Digital Signature
item.description: A cryptographic output used to verify the authenticity of data two operations : Signing Operation - uses a signing key to produce a signature over raw data Verification Operation - signature can be validated by a party who has no knowledge of the signing key Workflow two participants signer creates an asymmetric key uses this key to create multiple signatures

item.title: Public Key Infrastructure
item.description: A framework consisting of security policies, communication protocols, procedures, etc uses both symmetric and asymmetric How to trust a cloud?
